title: Land For Sale In Vihara Mawatha
details:
Two blocks of land (7.31 perches each) properly developed for housing purposes, available for sale.

Location - on Samarasinghe Pedesa, Off Vihara Mawatha, Kelaniya (as shown in Google Map)
1. 200m to Kelaniya Rajamaha Viharaya
2. Facing 20ft wide carpeted (Pradesheeya Sabha) road & 15ft wide by-road
3. 3.5 km to Airport Expressway
4. 6.7 km to Southern Expressway
5. Respectable neighborhood
6. Banks / Super Markets / Schools within walking distance
Facilities
Electricity
Pipe-borne Water
Clear title
